name: One Click Sandwich Hero
description:
Become the sandwich hero with only one mouse click! Make sandwiches, eat sandwiches, and stay alive. How long can your one click last, and how deep does your sandwich go? :)

Game created for the GMTK Game Jam, Aug 2019 with theme Only One.

Note: Mouse required for play; no keyboard support.

All resources are created by myself, except for the sounds and music which are obtained from FreeSounds.org through the Creative Common License 0. "Resources.txt" containing full list of resources, is included in downloadable zip folder.
